```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
# Importing data using the fread function of the data.table package
Riken <- fread("AD.auto.rsq07.mac10.tsv")
```

```{r}
Riken_sorted <- Riken[order(Riken$BETA,decreasing = T), ]
head(Riken_sorted, 20)
```

```{r}
Riken_head <- head(Riken_sorted, 20)
write.xlsx(Riken_head, "Riken_head.xlsx")
```

```{r}
head(Riken)
```

```{r}
# Scatterplotting with ggplot2
Riken_p <- ggplot(Riken, aes(x = AF_Allele2, y = BETA)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6, col = "#5B79FB") +
  labs(title = "Allele Frequency vs. Effect Estimate for Riken",
       x = "Allele Frequency",
       y = "Effect Estimate") +
  theme_minimal()
ggsave("Allele Frequency vs. Effect Estimate for Riken.png", Riken_p, width = 10, height = 8)
```
